thoughts.text: I will use the browse_website command to learn more about the hiking trails near me and plan my adventure.
thoughts.reasoning: Now that I have a list of hiking trails near me, I need to learn more about them and plan my adventure. The browse_website command will allow me to visit the websites of the trails and gather more information about them.
thoughts.plan:
- Select a hiking trail from the search results
- Use the browse_website command to visit the trail's website
- Gather information about the trail, including its difficulty level, length, and any necessary permits or fees
- Plan my adventure, including what to bring and how to get there
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I am not spending too much time planning and not enough time actually exploring. I should aim to plan efficiently and quickly so that I can start my adventure as soon as possible.
thoughts.speak: I will use the browse_website command to learn more about the hiking trails near me.

args.question: Which hiking trail do you want to learn more about?
